title: Ep 318: Matt Walsh & The Pecking Order
itunes:title: Ep 318: Matt Walsh & The Pecking Order
description:
Bobby forgets to use oven mitts. Matt learns about chicken culture. Khalyla's comfort food is pig knuckle stew. We talk pickleball, Jon Gruden's emails, the perfect PB&J ratio, and Matt's sourdough odyssey. 

TigerBelly Digital Collectibles
